name: alabaman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Alabama: An Alabaman has been crowned Miss America. As many as 70,000 Alabamians were killed or disabled in the American Civil War.
More examplesFewer examplesThe author is an Alabaman who graduated from Auburn University.As an Alabaman, I don't want to tell someone from California how to live their life.Alabamians pay the lowest taxes per capita in the United States.

belonging or relating to the US state of Alabama or its people: The story is about a gang of Alabaman outlaws. He was just back from Havana, where he was trying to sell Alabaman wine.
More examplesFewer examplesThe company was started by an Alabaman cotton trader. The Alabaman court dissolved their marriage.Quilting became popular with rural Alabamian women.
